Package co.cask.coopr.macro.eval

This package implements classes for evaluating different types of macros.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Evaluator Evaluator for a specific type of expression, such as an IP expression or a hostname expression.
 

Class Summary
ClusterOwnerEvaluator Evaluates a macro that expands to the cluster owner.
Evaluators Parses a macro string and returns the correct evaluator for expanding the macro.
HostSelfEvaluator Evaluates a macro that expands to the hostname of the specified node.
HostServiceEvaluator Evaluates a macro that expands to be a list of the hostnames of nodes in the cluster that contain a given service.
IPSelfEvaluator Evaluates a macro that expands to an ip address on the specified node.
IPServiceEvaluator Evaluates a macro that expands to be a list of the ip addresses of nodes in the cluster that contain a given service.
ServiceCardinalityEvaluator Evaluates a macro that expands to be the number of nodes in the cluster that contain a given service.
ServiceEvaluator Base class for evaluating service based macros.
ServiceInstanceEvaluator Evaluates a macro that expands to be the instance number of the given node that contains the given service.
 

Package co.cask.coopr.macro.eval Description

This package implements classes for evaluating different types of macros.
